page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF TAMNAMORE
page.content: Our area is mainly a beef farming area and is divided by the M1 motorway.The motorway stretches from Belfast to Dungannon,a distance of 38 miles.At the corner of the square lies the village of Killyman. The people work on the land in local transport firms and also in Dungannon, Portadown,Killyman and Moy. The inhabitants are Christian and belong to the Church of Ireland, Methodist,Presbyterian,Free Presbyterian and Roman Catholic denominations.Children attend three primary schools in the area,Tamnamore, Killyman and Laghy. When children reach eleven plus years they travel by bus to schools in Dungannon.There are many wildflowers in the fields and trees in the hedges.
